name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 410 | Daily Temperature Record
description:
This record documents a daily temperature and humidity measurement conducted at MaMeeFarm™.

The data was captured directly from a physical thermometer device installed on-site.
The values shown represent real environmental conditions at the exact moment of capture.

No interpretation, adjustment, or estimation has been applied.
This record exists solely as verifiable evidence of real-world environmental data under the DGCP™ framework.

Recorded Data:

Temperature: 15.1°C

Humidity: 72%

Time Displayed: 07:00

Date Displayed: 2025-12-30
